comments.raw_text:
Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110125 Firefox/4.0b10pre

Doorhanger notification dropdown button is blending with the background until the mouse is over it or over the other button.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Start Firefox with a clean Profile
2.Go to http://litmus.mozilla.org
3.Login

Actual Results:
3.The "Remember password" dropdown notification appears and the dropdown button is blending with the background

3.Expected Results:
3.The "Remember password" dropdown notification appears and the dropdown button is not blending with the background
comments.author: alex.lakatos.qa@gmail.com
